        Get all replica targets of file.
        Parameters:
        file - file

      • updateReplicaTargets

        public static void updateReplicaTargets(FsFile file,
                                        java.util.List<ReplicaTarget> newTargets)
                                 throws NotEnoughSpaceLeftException
        Update (replace) replica targets of file with newTargets.
        Parameters:
        file - file
        newTargets - new replica targets
        Throws:
        NotEnoughSpaceLeftException - thrown when device that replica is on does not have enough space to fit new size.

      • forceUpdateReplicaTargets

        public static void forceUpdateReplicaTargets(FsFile file,
                                             java.util.List<ReplicaTarget> newTargets)
        Forcefully updates (replaces) replica targets. When any mount device does not have enough space to fit replica's new size it will be automatically resized to fit.
        Parameters:
        file - file
        newTargets - new replica targets

      • forceReplicateFile

        public static void forceReplicateFile(FsFile file,
                                      java.util.List<ReplicaTarget> targets)
        Forcefully replicate new file file.
        Parameters:
        file - file
        targets - replica targets

      • canReplicaBeResized

        public static boolean canReplicaBeResized(FsFile file)
        Checks if replicas of file file can be resized - if their storage devices have enough space available.
        Parameters:
        file - file
        Returns:
        true if replica can be resized, false otherwise

      • canReplicaBeResized

        public static boolean canReplicaBeResized(FsFile file,
                                          java.util.List<ReplicaTarget> targets)
        Checks if replicas of file file can be resized - if their storage devices have enough space available.
        Parameters:
        file - file
        targets - replica targets
        Returns:
        true if replica can be resized, false otherwise

      • replicateFile

                                 java.util.List<ReplicaTarget> targets)
                          throws NotEnoughSpaceLeftException
        Replicate new file to targets targets.
        Parameters:
        file - file
        targets - replica targets
        Throws:
        NotEnoughSpaceLeftException - thrown when any target device does not have enough space to fit new replica.

      • forceResizeReplicatedFile

        public static void forceResizeReplicatedFile(FsFile file,
                                             ByteSize newSize)
        Forcefully resize replicated file file to newSize. Any replica target devices that do not have enough space available will be automatically resized.
        Parameters:
        file - file
        newSize - new size

      • resizeReplicatedFile

        public static void resizeReplicatedFile(FsFile file,
                                        ByteSize newSize)
                                 throws NotEnoughSpaceLeftException
        Resize replicated file file to newSize.
        Parameters:
        file - file
        newSize - new size
        Throws:
        NotEnoughSpaceLeftException - thrown when any target device does not have enough space to fit replica with new size newSize.

        Parameters:
        path - path
        Returns:
        replica instance if found, null otherwise

      • isFileReplicated

        public static boolean isFileReplicated(FsFile file)
        Checks whether file is replicated to multiple targets.
        Parameters:
        file - file
        Returns:
        true if replicated, false otherwise

      • propagateReplicaResize

        public static void propagateReplicaResize(FsFile file,
                                          ModelServerNode origin,
                                          DfsPathPicker pathBuilder,
                                          SimulationType simulationType,
                                          DfsSimulatorLogger logger,
                                          long sTime)
        Propagate resize of file file - all replicas have to be updates, therefore we need to create appropriate transfers (and disk operations).
        Parameters:
        file - file
        origin - server, that has updated replica (originating server)
        pathBuilder - path builder used to build path
        simulationType - running simulation type
        logger - simulation logger
        sTime - simulation time
